title: House Industries
content:
Just thought I'd share these guys  
 [http://www.houseind.com/objects/posters/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107095302/http:/www.houseind.com/objects/posters/ "http://www.houseind.com/objects/posters/")

Some really great silk-screened letterforms.  
I especially love this B

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107095302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PLINC%20B%20Lg_5122.jpg)

I'm ordering mine for my desk at work. Hopefully some of you guys go in an support these guys.

full disclaimer: I don't know anyone at house industries and can in no way profit from this post. Just sharing
author: Pentapus
